# kABTitleProperty

**Global Variable**

Title, such as “Mr.,” “Mrs.,” “General,” “Cardinal,” or “Lord.” Type: [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/kABStringProperty].

## Declaration

```swift
let kABTitleProperty: String
```

## Constants

- **kABFirstNameProperty**: First name. Type: [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/kABStringProperty].
- **kABLastNameProperty**: Last name. Type: [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/kABStringProperty].
- **kABFirstNamePhoneticProperty**: Phonetic representation of the first name. Type: [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/kABStringProperty].
- **kABLastNamePhoneticProperty**: Phonetic representation of the last name. Type: [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/kABStringProperty].
- **kABNicknameProperty**: Nickname. Type: [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/kABStringProperty].
- **kABMaidenNameProperty**: Maiden name. Type: [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/kABStringProperty].
- **kABBirthdayProperty**: Birth date. Type: [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/kABDateProperty].
- **kABBirthdayComponentsProperty**: Birth date as date components. Type: [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/kABDateComponentsProperty].
- **kABOrganizationProperty**: Company name. Type: [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/kABStringProperty].
- **kABJobTitleProperty**: Job title. Type: [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/kABStringProperty].
- **kABHomePageProperty**: Home web page. Type: [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/kABStringProperty].
- **kABURLsProperty**: Web pages. Type: [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/kABMultiStringProperty].
- **kABCalendarURIsProperty**: Calendar URIs. Type: [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/kABMultiStringProperty].
- **kABEmailProperty**: Email addresses. Type: [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/kABMultiStringProperty].
- **kABAddressProperty**: Street addresses. Type: [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/kABMultiDictionaryProperty].
